name: Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy
description:
Set off on a quest for the Great White Birds in a mysterious land full of secrets!Answer the call of exploration as you travel to Amerzone, a forgotten Latin American country, to fulfill the last wishes of a late explorer.

Investigate the ruins of this secretive land reclaimed by nature, meet intriguing characters with deep backstories and solve intricate puzzles to uncover the truth.

Will you unveil the mysteries surrounding the mythical Great White Birds?


(Re)Discover the work of Benoît Sokal before the Syberia saga.


Discover a land shaped by mysteries and secrets as you travel through eerie and breathtaking environments


Find clues and solve intricate puzzles to carry your quest for the Great White Birds in a faithful yet enriched story


Learn about people with deep backstories, and listen to their stories to mend the errors of the past
